docstring.long_description:
Inputs
------
ip_address: TextBlob
    The IP address of the robot arm.
docstring.short_description: The SET_BLENDING to make the moves of the robot arm smoother.

parameters.name: blending
parameters.description: The blending factor to use when moving between keyframes. If not specified, the default value of 0.0 is used.

returns.description: The IP address of the robot arm.
